metadata.base_style: cinematic realism, photorealistic detail, shallow depth of field, warm sunlight

sequence.description: The camera begins with a top-down view of the completed muscle meal: perfectly grilled chicken breast with golden sear marks, steamed broccoli glowing green with rising steam, fluffy white rice, and halved boiled eggs with vivid yolks. A chilled protein shake glass sits beside the plate, condensation droplets forming on its surface.

sequence.transition: As the camera pulls back, the wooden kitchen table environment comes into frame. A single metallic dumbbell rests casually near the plate, grounding the scene in the gym-to-kitchen theme.

sequence.camera: shift from table focus → slight tilt up to mid-frame
sequence.description: A male user enters from the background, shown only from the back and shoulders down. He pulls a chair inward and sits, his torso silhouette partially lit by warm sunlight pouring through the kitchen window.

sequence.motion: Steam continues drifting upward from the hot food. The dumbbell subtly rolls a few centimeters as if freshly placed. The chair scrapes softly across the floor while the user leans forward toward the plate, muscles in his arms and shoulders outlined beneath a fitted T-shirt.

sequence.ending: The frame locks into a cinematic composition: the meal in crisp focus at the foreground, the dumbbell beside it as a symbolic anchor, and the user’s upper torso blurred in the background silhouette—face unseen but presence strongly felt.

audio.music: Warm cinematic score with subtle heroic undertone, fading into a calm sustained note
audio.sound_effects: chair slide, faint dumbbell roll, subtle cloth movement, soft exhale, steam hiss
audio.mix_level: balanced and natural, emphasizing realism without overpowering the visual focus
